website_summaries.verdict: The Asus U46E-BAL6 is a processing goliath, thanks to its quad-core processor, and it's only meant for those who abuse their laptops with high-end video and photo editing packages. No backlit keyboard. The Asus U46E-BAL6 is a mainstream laptop that caters to hardcore video editors or serious performance enthusiasts.
pros: WiDi 2.0 and WiMAX wireless technologies built-in

website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Zenbook UX31-RSL8 is the clear leader in the nascent ultrabook category, with better overall performance and battery life than any competitor. It also has a brilliant display, superb sound, and solid construction.
pros: Ultra Low-Voltage Core i5 processor is efficient
Security features provide peace of mind
Includes mini VGA-to-VGA and USB-to-Ethernet dongles  for added connectivity
Solid-state drive offers instant boot-up and resume time
cons: SSD offers smaller storage  capacity than competitors with spinning drives
Mini HDMI port instead of full-size

customer_reviews.title: Great ultrabook, Takes Ubuntu well
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for the purpose of making an Ubuntu ultrabook for programming with. excellent choice. it came with windows 8, which i replaced with 12.04 LTS. very easy install, all the hardware worked. the next day i decided to upgrade to 13.10 upgrade process was smooth, went to 12.10, then straight to 13.10. no issues. 13.10 runs great on it, and i haven't noticed any problems with compatibility. my only complaint, and this is being very pedantic, is that it could use better friction hinges on the lid. they're a little weak sometimes if you bump the computer. but really that is a minor complaint, over all i couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I have ever owned in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop 2013 as my everyday office work laptop. It ran incredibly smooth throughout my 3 years working at my company, I always ran dual monitors with it since day one. Best laptop I have ever owned in my opinion. Never had any issues and it still runs like the day I received it. Battery still holds 3+ hours unplugged while running photoshop and other programs. I got picked up by apple and they are providing me with a macbook pro so this is gonna go home with me and replace my desktop at home now. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a powerful pc!
customer_reviews.author: onlorders

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop Ever
customer_reviews.text: This Asus UX31A-DH51 is my best laptop ever. It beats my wife's $1k+ Dell laptop easily. This Asus is lightning fast on boot because of the solid-state drive--128 GB is plenty of storage, too. I travel, and this laptop is a good traveling companion. It is rugged and beautiful. I use my ham radio internet remote base on this laptop--it is very stable and the audio is superb. I had initial problems with the touchpad. After I updated the drivers it is rock solid. Battery life is sufficiently long for cross-country flights. Buy this laptop. I researched greatly, settling on this one--I am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: MMMMMM

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop but poor ASUS technical support
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best laptop. I bought the VAIO TAP 11 before purchasing this laptop, because the screen is larger 13 instead of 11. Battery life is good. There are couple issues with this laptop like internet get drop when upgrade to Windows 8.1 Can wakeup from external mouse. Spent couple days with ASUS technical support without making any progress. I end up get help from google search with trial & error I am rating the ASUS technical support = 1 star. Laptop = 4 star compare to VAIO TAP 11 design.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I received the laptop in a really nice compact asus box which was sealed. All the components as stated by the seller were there and the laptop has been working great. Its a beautiful high definition screen and the laptop itself is sleek, stylish and really light weight. My only problem would be the track pad sometimes changes the page I am viewing on its own. I was very hesitant about buying a laptop from amazon but after this experience will never be worried again. It is unfortunate that the price has gone up since I bought it but its still a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Very light, stylish, and powers up quickly. I have had wifi connectivity issues when all my other gear has functioned, flawlessly. And the touchpad gestures will randomly turn off, which is annoying. Aside from that, it does the job very well and makes my life as a student considerably easier. The battery life lasts me through a day of classes and then some. Everyone who has seen it has commented on how good it looks. Not surprising. The poor quality of the webcam is lame, but I knew that it was low res before I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Slader

customer_reviews.title: Stylish laptop with great screen, and actually useful added software.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful laptop. Super stylish, beautiful screen and accessories, and boots quickly. Normally I am used to bloatware installed by OEMs, but this one had minimal added software - and what was there worked flawlessly. I especially appreciated the ASUS performance monitor - that shows disk/memory/network access per process.
customer_reviews.author: iplayfullout

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, good specs - serves me well for almost 4 years now. Had some touchpad issues that were solved when I moved to windows 10. Still one of the best and sharpest screens I've seen - even compared with newer models.
customer_reviews.author: Idan F.

customer_reviews.title: So close
customer_reviews.text: I loved this laptop, I would have loved it even more if I didn't have to return it due to a faulty keyboard but that's not the laptops fault I tried to cheap out and buy used. My only wish would be the chipset and processor be updated to the most current version and keep the nice matte finished screen instead of the high gloss found on newer win8 machines with touch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Von Roch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Have had it for 2 years for everyday use. Laptop boots pretty fast, and light weight. Battery still goes for 3+ hours after full charge. Have upgraded to Windows 10. No issues so far. Touch pad is sensitive. I have got used to being careful with it and also have a wireless mouse attached when I am on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but fragile
customer_reviews.text: Powerful laptop. Screen lever is weak, tends to break or get really loose. Had a faulty battery after 3 years
customer_reviews.author: M.J. van der Veen

customer_reviews.title: The mouse is SUPER sensitive and I will be typing away and find ...
customer_reviews.text: The mouse is SUPER sensitive and I will be typing away and find that my mouse has moved and I'm typing in the wrong place. I do like the light weight of this product though.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Fast, love the screen resolution and the backlite keyboard and plus it is really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Spock

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop, Minor Flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this laptop is great. Works very well, amazing resolution for a laptop, fast boot up time, very light weight, sleek, etc. I gave this laptop a 4 rating because although the laptop impressed me, the smart gestures for the touch pad stopped working first day I got it. Hopefully I can find a fix soon...
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Runs like a champ; for very light work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one a year later to replace the UX31A-DB51 that I sent back 2 weeks after buying due to faulty keyboard and track pad. The UX31A-DH51 is awesome, bought it in Feb 2013, no problems. Runs like a champ. Though I only use it for light word processing and nothing else. I still have my work horse machines for the heavy lifting. Both are core i7 with 8g+ or more of RAM, 1g+ discrete graphics cards or more; one is a Desktop the other is a 5lb laptop.
customer_reviews.author: +Fred Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook
customer_reviews.text: Light as a feather, works with Ubuntu, fast. Screen is great too. No problems at all. Recommend for power users.
customer_reviews.author: auswalk

customer_reviews.title: 2nd zenbook
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop. This is the 2nd time I bought the same product. Do recommend to people who are looking for a light and high-end notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRICE- I NOW HAVE 2 ASUS UX 31 Zenbooks. Love them. VERRY VERRY THIN and Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond M. Zigmond

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have never placed my hands on a better computer in my life. It's stunning. Ever since I got this Zenbook three months ago, I haven't gone a few days without a compliment on how gorgeous it is. It definitely rivals the Macbook Air in every aspect except battery life, which is still up-to-par or better than most laptops of this caliber. I haven't gotten bored with the design or anything about it. It runs smooth, the touchpad works perfectly, the screen resolution and picture are definitely better than the Macbook Pro, and it is overall a beautiful computer, and one of the best purchases I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sexy Device but misleading hard drive specs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sexy laptop. Thin and light. Decent sound for a compact computer. My biggest gripes were the lack of hard drive space. The laptop specs were listed at 128 GB. However only 90 GB is usable and of that 90 GB, 40 GB were already filled with pre-installed software. The laptop also had issues connecting with my WiFi which none of my past laptops/ phones/ ipad had problems with.
customer_reviews.author: connie chuck

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this a few weeks but I am very impressed. This unit is very light and the display is really good. Only nice things to say so far.....
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Martin

customer_reviews.title: great little laptop
customer_reviews.text: slim, light to carry, user friendly, this asus is a great little laptop. I am not so keen on windows 8 but I guess its a question of habit!
customer_reviews.author: g de chamberet

customer_reviews.title: Poor touchpad
customer_reviews.text: Touchpad has a lot of problems with sensitivity. After about a month of using it, the touchpad sometimes would just stop working, period.
customer_reviews.author: Zi Yao Chen

customer_reviews.title: This is my ASUS review
customer_reviews.text: Love the SSD. Boot up time is lightning fast. Still on the fence about Windows 8. Love the portability. Buy this ultrabook.
customer_reviews.author: thomas hall

customer_reviews.title: My favorite laptop ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop so much. Wish I would have opted for the larger hard drive model as my Dropbox is taking up 30g. Will get ASUS zenbook only from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: Doc B

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop for college
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop for college, and it has been a great choice. It is very light and has solid build construction. I would recommend it to anyone needing a laptop for college or business.
customer_reviews.author: Drew L

customer_reviews.title: Great Job for Asus
customer_reviews.text: Excelent value and performance dollar for dollar, extra slim design. Great quality in its construction. I have an HP with same characteristics and Asus outperforms with exception of batery life time.
customer_reviews.author: Hundredplayer00

customer_reviews.title: Best Ultra-book considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Thin, light, long battery life, a Full HD screen, a very high speed SSD, even better than I expected. If you do not want a very high speed CPU, this is the best ultra-book you can buy at this price. For browsing or watching movie or using office applications (Not running MATLAB or any high load simulators), it is a perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: Sayyed Karen Khatamifard

customer_reviews.title: So far, great ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is very fast and thin, pretty much what i expected. One thing to note: You only get about 50-60 GB of ssd storage for your personal use if you are buying the 128 GB model
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Price-Quality incredible
customer_reviews.text: Incredible price for this laptop, I have been using it for several weeks and I'm pretty happy with it. Very fast and light. If you are looking for a well related price-quality laptop this si the one. Seller dispatch it quickly too
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: If you hear people saying negative things about this laptop, or really picky things about this or that which are making you think twice about getting it, just ignore them. This laptop is incredible. Asus make insanely good hardware, from the moment you open the box everything inside will look clean and slick as if they put heaps of thought into presentation. Which they did. If you want a light weight laptop which you can carry around easily and get a good amount of power from then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sandilands

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, no regrets
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek and light, this notebook was exactly what I needed to do my basic work processing, browsing and movie watching at home and on the go. The screen has a fantastic resolution, battery life is also pretty good, and it doesn't get super hot sitting on your lap for a long time like a lot of laptops. My only complaint is that while the specs state that the notebook comes with 128GB ram, in actuality, with all pre-installed programs/apps, it's about 90GB. Other than that, I've had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Anh Vu

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. Well engineered, track pad sensitive but very usable, uses the most of the same gestures the MAC does. GREAT battery life.
customer_reviews.author: DJL Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Love her
customer_reviews.text: I just love her. Sure, you have to mess around to get a better touchpad driver. Other than that, it's a very pretty, lightweight and functional laptop.
customer_reviews.author: mchester

customer_reviews.title: A great computer
customer_reviews.text: I like the Zenbook. Very fast, light and portable. Great design, with two USB3 ports and accessories for projector and LAN connection.
customer_reviews.author: Andran

customer_reviews.title: very cool
customer_reviews.text: very very cool. met expectations, excellent performance. I advise you to buy, great price and quality goods. very very very cool
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, poor service!!
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied product and poor service. Always has Internet connection issue and the touchpad is too flexible to use which I can hardly control it very well. I required a return within 30 days, but wa rejected by the seller. Very Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Xinyi Shen

customer_reviews.title: Did anybody else have ms office 2010 on their ux31a?
customer_reviews.text: I have ms2010 office in the apps. When I click on it, it says I need the 25 character key to open it. No key in the packaging. Called asus, they said call ms. Called them and they said it was probably a trial copy. That is not what office says when you try to open it, it has a checkmark by the run the program and when I click on that it then asks for the key code Anybody experience this? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Clarke Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Poor return option
customer_reviews.text: The 20%restock fee is usurjous on a item not used. It's almost as bad as GE Capital Credit's interes policies.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: Had my Asus ultrabook for about 6 weeks --- thus far has exceeded all my expectations. Recommend highly. I carry it like spiral notebook
customer_reviews.author: Janis F.

customer_reviews.title: Slim and light laptop
customer_reviews.text: It is much slim and light than I owned before. The body is made by unibody and thus it is firm and solid.
customer_reviews.author: C.T Chen

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: Too light Too thin Great price, really fast, i do recommended this! only problem is the hard drive, only 128gb ssd.
customer_reviews.author: Nilena Dias

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, light ultra book
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Was able to load with Ubuntu 12.10 (but wireless didn't work out of the box), so loaded 13.04 and wireless works well. I also tried Fedora 18 and 19a, but no luck even booting with either. Windows 8 was different, but not what I want. The zenbook is fast and keyboard is very usable. Screen is sharp and nice to work with. I've only been using it for a few days, I may add more comments later...
customer_reviews.author: LRS

customer_reviews.title: It was fine except I was expecting a touch screen
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly ordered this system as I thought it had a touch screen. I returned it immediately when I found it did not.
customer_reviews.author: D. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: worst laptop ever. it descrbes that it come with one year protection watranty. but it doesnt. be careful when you are choosing to.buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Do Not BUY!!! Slow as molasses. Not a touch screen.
customer_reviews.text: Please please please do not spend your hard earned money buying this awful laptop. I expected a touch screen...it did not have one. I spend hours attempting to download app updates that wouldn't update, and had to manually deal with other software issues that should have automatically worked. I do not mind tinkering with a laptop to get special features to work, but this one was way too much work for too little value. I returned this computer within 3 hours of opening the box. Again, Please DO NOT purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ohtotoro

customer_reviews.title: LIghtweight, powerful and good battery life
customer_reviews.text: However....touchpad/mouse are not as smooth as I would like and Windows 8 is a disaster in my opinion. Extremely counter intuitive, it takes a long time to figure out how to do simple things. The Windows apps functionality is stupid and useless -- Microsoft should leave the apps to Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Only half the disk space available for usage
customer_reviews.text: Looks ultra slim, light weight and posh, no doubt about that. Strong body and very good screen resolution. I am still returning it, because the available disk space is almost half (66GB) of what was stated (128GB). Losing 10 - 20 GB on OS and recovery is OK, but losing 50% of an already tiny disk space.. you got to be kidding me. And I was told, you cannot extend memory and disk space on this machine as things are hard wired and it is intended for use as is purpose. okkkk.. May be good for gaming and entertainment. But, not for work + entertainment...
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

product_meta.title: ASUS UX31A-DH51 Laptop (Windows 8, Intel Core i5 3317U 1.5 GHz, 13" LED-lit Screen, Storage: 128 GB, RAM: 4 GB) Silver Aluminum
product_meta.description:
Shop the Windows Store for the full selection of Windows 8 PCs
